properties.name: exportRao
properties.description: 0: nothing, -+1: using the Haskind exciting force, -+2: using the diffraction exciting force, 3: output field data only for specified radiation modes.

properties.name: exportOnBody
properties.description: 0: nothing, 1: pressure, 2: velocity, 3: pressure and velocity.

properties.name: exportOnField
properties.description: 0: nothing, 1: pressure, 2: velocity, 3: pressure and velocity, negative value, export using source formulation. if negative value for exportRAO, only radiation modes will be exported.
